about_the_game:
In Musi-Chance, you control the child of a godly being and make the mistake of breaking the bridge between the physical realm and the musical realm. As punishment you are sent to the musical realm to find the pieces of the bridge, the 5 staff lines, and repair it. Will you be able to restore harmony between the two realms, or be stuck in the musical realm as the universe crumbles?

Features:

  • Progress through the world by adjusting the background music to reveal the path or make a new friend
  • When the chance meter fills up, roll the dice to be able to adjust new parts of the music
  • Killing or hurting your opponents is not required, (or even recommended for that matter)
  • Travel through a 2D world of platforming and puzzles
  • Battle in 3D in a circular ring and dodge attacks while moving around opponents
  • .....? What's going on? Why does that person look just like me?
  • A heartwarming story and soundtrack
  • .....Wait, why am I saying these things? And why do I see someone behind a giant screen?
